column4: Hi, I've got a problem with my ubuntu since upgraded to 10.04. Preferable when watching a video in mplayer, all USB devices cease to work. Sadly no syslog message. Any ideas how to debug this?
there are many howto's like this one > http://www.cyberciti.biz/faq/ubuntu-mounting-your-encrypted-home-from-livecd/
wrong link? I don't have encrypted home dirs
